Top-3 Scripts:
so_19006421: #!/bin/bash
tac infile.txt | sed "s/<\/VirtualHost>//; ta ; b ; :a ; N ; ba" | tac
echo "</VirtualHost>" >>infile.txt

#!/bin/bash
tac infile.txt | sed "s/<\/VirtualHost>//; ta ; b ; :a ; N ; ba" | tac > new_file
echo "</VirtualHost>" >> new_file
mv new_file infile.txt

Top-3 Scripts:
so_12604366: delete=yes
for file in *.png
do
    if [ $delete = yes ]
    then rm -f $file; delete=no
    else delete=yes
    fi
done

delete=yes
for file in *.png
do
    if [ $delete = yes ]
    then echo $file; delete=no
    else delete=yes
    fi
done |
xargs rm -f

ls *.png |
awk 'NR % 2 == 1 { print }' |
xargs rm -f
